review_details: Had a great time. Palma is very near. Local buses available. Bottle of cava left in room, I assume for my mum's birthday. Hotel is clean and staff were friendly. Highly recommend. Would revisit again.

reviewTitle: A must do when visiting Kefalonia
review_details: I had an amazing day fishing/ swimming and of course eating on this excursion, would do again in a heart beat. Great fun for all ages and the hosts were amazing. I met several people on this trip, and everyone had a great time. Thanks. X
